title: Minecraft 基岩版 Beta 1.15.0.54 发布
author: zyjking
txt_content:
测试版是Minecraft基岩版的测试机制，主要用于下一个正式版的特性预览。
然而，测试版主要用于新特性展示，通常存在大量漏洞。因此对于普通玩家建议仅做测试尝鲜用。使用测试版打开存档前请务必备份。适用于正式版的领域服务器与测试版不兼容。
如果在测试版中遇到旧版存档无法使用的问题，测试版将允许你将存档上传以供开发团队查找问题。
Minecraft基岩版 1.15 仍未发布，1.15.0.54为其第3个测试版。
转载本贴时须要注明原作者以及本帖地址。
https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/360040273531

Fixes:
bug修复：

修复了18个bug
Crashes/Performance崩溃/性能
Fixed several crashes that could occur during gameplay修复了游玩时可能发生的崩溃问题Fixed a crash that could sometimes occur when travelling towards -z coordinates修复了有时沿z轴移动时可能发生的崩溃问题Fixed a crash that could occur when adjusting certain JSON strings in behaviour packs修复了在调整行为包中特定JSON字符串时可能发生的崩溃问题Fixed a crash that could sometimes occur after resuming the game on Xbox One修复了Xbox One上点击“继续游戏”时可能发生的崩溃问题Fixed a crash that could occur when using the Character Creator修复了使用角色创建器时可能发生的崩溃问题Fixed a crash that could happen if a slime targeted something and lost sight of it修复了当史莱姆瞄准目标但从视野中消失时可能发生的崩溃问题

General常规
Fixed an issue that prevented players from being teleported to a nearby chunk that the game thought was too far away修复了一个会阻止玩家传送到“游戏认为太远”的临近区块问题Fixed an issue that was preventing chunks from loading in correctly when travelling between dimensions (MCPE-63268)修复了在两个维度之间传送时区块加载不正确的问题Fixed an issue that prevented Strongholds from generating with libraries and portal rooms (MCPE-63713)修复了要塞不会生成图书馆和末地传送室的问题Ocean Monuments once again generate with the correct interior structures (MCPE-63523)生成海底遗迹时不会有部分空着了

Gameplay游玩
Players will no longer be teleported underneath the main island when using an End Gateway (MCPE-63284)使用末地折跃门时不会被传送到虚空了Fixed an issue that meant Pillager Patrols could spawn in unexpected places (MCPE-58285)掠夺者巡逻队不会到处生成了Fixed an issue that prevented inventories from being opened after riding a mount (MCPE-63196)修复了骑上坐骑之后无法打开物品栏的问题

Mobs生物
Tweaked the Iron Golem strolling animation (MCPE-63151)调整铁傀儡的动画轨迹速度Fixed an issue that prevented Polar Bears, Parrots, Ocelots, and Dolphins from being leashed (MCPE-63095)修复了会让北极熊，鹦鹉，豹猫和海豚从栓绳上逃跑的问题

User Interface用户界面
The "Require players to accept resource packs to join" checkbox is now visible again“需要玩家接受材质包才可加入”会正常弹窗了Fixed the 'Take a tour' navigation arrows in the Marketplace修复了市场中“带我逛逛”导向物品不对的问题

Add-Ons and Scripting追加包和脚本
Entities no longer freeze when a component group containing a navigation component is removed移除一个组件组，当其中带有导向组件时，实体不会被冻结了


相关地址谷歌正版https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.mojang.minecraftpe基岩版测试组安卓Google Play：https://play.google.com/apps/testing/com.mojang.minecraftpeWin10 Store：https://www.microsoft.com/zh-cn/store/p/xbox-insider-hub/9nblggh68vsk

外部来源以及详细的更新条目追踪Minecraft官网（内容英文）Jeb的Twitter（英文）Jason的Twitter（英文）Matt Booty的Twitter（英文）tomcc的Twitter（英文）MattGartzke的Twitter（英文）HelenAngel的Twitter（英文）Chupacaubrey的Twitter（英文）Minecraft官方论坛（英文）Minecraft博客（英文）
